title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 511-2.3 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 511-2.3 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part shall apply to any provider that proposes to
operate a CMHRS program of services that must be certified by the Office of

Mental Health. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
§§
511-2.3

Adopted

New

York State Register July 17, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 29, eff. 7/17/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
